Seed: The seed used to introduce random transform variations when enabled
bProjectElementsDown: Whether or not the pattern items should be projected along the negative Z axis of the plane mechanic
ProjectionOffset: How much each pattern item should be moved along the negative Z axis of the plane mechanic if Project Elements Down is enabled
bHideSources: Hide the source meshes when enabled
bUseRelativeTransforms: If false, all pattern elements will be positioned at the origin of the first pattern element
bRandomlyPickElements: Whether to randomly pick which source mesh is scattered at each location, or to always use all source meshes
SingleAxis: Axis direction used for the Pattern geometry
SinglePlane: Plane used for the Pattern geometry
